# <a name="how-to-find-options-in-outlookcom-settings"></a><span data-ttu-id="97562-102">Como Localizar opções nas configurações do Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="97562-102">How to find options in Outlook.com settings</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="97562-103">Na parte superior da página, selecione o ícone de engrenagem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="97562-103">At the top of the page, select the gear icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="97562-104">para abrir configurações.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="97562-104">to open Settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="97562-105">Na parte inferior do painel configurações, selecione [**Exibir todas as configurações do Outlook**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="97562-105">At the bottom of the Settings pane, select [**View all Outlook settings**](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/timeAndLanguage).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="97562-106">Isso mostrará as opções e configurações premium gerais, de email, calendário e (se aplicável).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="97562-106">This will show your General, Email, Calendar, and (if applicable) Premium settings and options.</span></span>
